name: The Endless loneliness
description: My illustration collection, comes out of the obstacles and challenges that we are facing in the world today. *Illuminator uses an optimistic approach in finding light in the darkness.*  We have no choice but to step into the increasing darkness ahead and to follow the mirage of light. Like a blind person, learning how to walk in the dark again we are learning how to live with the constant ruin of prosperity, our desires, loneliness and being away from the loved ones, love ---- Size: 2000 px * 2000 px Technique: Mixed Media
